__e: I was just thinking about it, and I was thinking that maybe you were waiting for some friend to try and stop you from going through with the wedding by asking if you're even ready to go and get married.
And then a few weeks ago, he came into some money all of a sudden and says, "Let's get hitched."
If anyone here, should know of any impediment... why these two should not be joined in holy wedlock... let them speak now, or forever hold their peace.
